raw_comment:
WOMAN LOVE THEIR PARENTS MORE

I notice that on average, women seem to be more in touched with their parents and contact them more.

I wonder why we see this trend, is it not cool for men to be in contact with their parents and check in on them?

This relates to my community because as more people leave for college in my home town their parents get worried about their safety. If men don't contact their parents then they will be more worried.
ace_sentences: Women love their parents more than men.
On average, women are more in touch with their parents than men.
On average, women contact their parents more than men.
I wonder why this trend exists.
Some people think that it is not cool for men to be in touch with their parents.
Some people think that it is not cool for men to check in on their parents.
This trend relates to my community.
Many people leave my home town for college.
Some parents in my home town worry about the safety of their children.
If men do not contact their parents, then their parents will worry more.
